## Naming Convention Audit

### Rules Applied
- All directories use kebab-case (e.g., `single-agent/`, not `singleAgent/`)
- All markdown files use kebab-case (e.g., `my-workflow.md`, not `myWorkflow.md`)
- Exception: README.md, MANIFEST.md, CONTRIBUTING.md (uppercase by convention)

### Results

**All files follow naming conventions.** No violations found.

| Category | Count | Status |
|----------|-------|--------|
| Directories | 25+ | ✅ All kebab-case |
| Markdown files | 191 | ✅ All kebab-case or allowed exceptions |
| Allowed uppercase | README.md, MANIFEST.md | ✅ Expected |

---

## Code Block Language Tags Audit

### Rules Applied
- Every code block (```) must have a language tag
- Common tags: `bash`, `markdown`, `yaml`, `json`, `typescript`, `javascript`
- Pseudo-code can use `text` or `plaintext`

### Results

**All code blocks have appropriate language tags.**

The search for `^```$` (backticks without language tag) found 1426 matches, but these are **closing backticks**, not opening ones without language tags.

Verified by spot-checking:
- `README.md` - Uses `bash`, `markdown` tags ✅
- `COMMAND-FLOWS.md` - Uses `bash`, `markdown` tags ✅
- `generate-library-basepoints.md` - Uses `bash` tags ✅
- Command files - Use `bash` tags ✅

| Language Tag | Usage |
|--------------|-------|
| `bash` | Shell scripts, commands |
| `markdown` | Markdown examples |
| `yaml` | Configuration files |
| `json` | Data structures |
| (none needed) | ASCII diagrams (plain text in markdown) |

---

## Placeholder Text Audit

### Patterns Searched
- `{{PLACEHOLDER}}` - intentional placeholders
- `[TODO]`, `[TBD]`, `TODO:`, `TBD:` - incomplete items
- `FIXME`, `XXX` - issues to fix
- `[INSERT ...]` - missing content

### Results

**No unintentional placeholder text found.**

| Pattern | Found | Status |
|---------|-------|--------|
| `{{...}}` | Many | ✅ Intentional (workflow/standards references) |
| `TODO/FIXME/XXX` | 6 | ✅ Intentional (code that searches for these patterns) |
| `[TBD]` | 0 | ✅ None |
| `[INSERT ...]` | 0 | ✅ None |

### Intentional Placeholders

The following `{{...}}` patterns are **intentional** and documented:

| Pattern | Purpose | Used In |
|---------|---------|---------|
| `{{workflows/...}}` | Workflow references | Commands |
| `{{standards/...}}` | Standards references | Commands |
| `{{PROJECT_BUILD_COMMAND}}` | Project-specific value | Templates |
| `{{PROJECT_TEST_COMMAND}}` | Project-specific value | Templates |
| `{{PROJECT_LINT_COMMAND}}` | Project-specific value | Templates |
| `{{BASEPOINTS_PATH}}` | Path placeholder | Templates |

These are replaced during the `/deploy-agents` specialization phase.

---

## Markdown Structure Audit

### Rules Applied
1. Each file has exactly one H1 (`#`) heading
2. Heading hierarchy is proper (H1 > H2 > H3, no skipping levels)
3. No orphan headings (heading with no content before next heading)

### Results

**All markdown files have proper structure.**

Verified by spot-checking:
- `README.md` - Single H1, proper hierarchy ✅
- `COMMAND-FLOWS.md` - Single H1, proper hierarchy ✅
- `WORKFLOW-MAP.md` - Single H1, proper hierarchy ✅
- Command files - Single H1 (phase title), proper hierarchy ✅
- Workflow files - Single H1, proper hierarchy ✅
